name: manyfold
description: Manyfold is a self-hosted, multi-user 3D model repository for sharing and previewing STL files. It includes 3D previews, categories, user permissions, and integrations for organizing models in teams.
features: 3D model preview: View STL, OBJ, and other 3D file formats directly in the browser without downloads.
Multi-user access: Support multiple users with individual accounts and permission levels.
Category system: Organize models into categories and subcategories for easy browsing.
Tag management: Apply custom tags to models for flexible filtering and search.
File versioning: Track multiple versions of the same model with revision history.
Bulk upload: Upload multiple 3D files simultaneously to quickly populate your library.
Search functionality: Find models by name, description, tags, or file properties.
Print tracking: Log print jobs and track which models have been successfully printed.
Collection sharing: Share specific collections with team members or make them public.
Metadata editing: Add descriptions, print settings, and custom fields to each model.
Storage management: Monitor disk usage and organize files across multiple storage locations.
API access: Integrate with slicing software or other tools through REST API.
